text:
One, two, three, four
Five, six, seven, eight──
(Returning to the normal tempo makes it difficult to follow...)
Maybe I should just keep it looping for a while...

One, two, three, four
Five, six, seven, eight.
(Why do I lose it when I try to return to the tempo?)

Um...
How long have you been there...?

I've been watching for a bit, and Hiori,
you've been practicing on your own, right?
I thought you might need a break after a while.
I haven't quite achieved what I envisioned yet.

Yes. Because I've become an idol,
I have to work hard, otherwise, it's meaningless.
I can't afford to show anything half-hearted.

But, if you push yourself too hard, it might not be
good for you or your performance, Hiori.

Hiori, you once said something like this to me.
Now, I'm giving it back to you.

Yeah.
If I say that, it's like abandoning your feelings, right?

The situation now is different from when you said it to me. I had an
end to what I was doing, but what you're doing doesn't have an end.

So, I can't just tell you to take a break right now...
...Yeah.

The step you're stumbling on right now,
take a break once you can do it at 0.75x speed.

No, it's not selfish at all.
It's because you're serious about being an idol.

But, to stay serious in the future,
take care of yourself too.
